title: Florida Republicans Demand Miami Herald Fire Columnist for 'Thin the Ranks' Coronavirus Remark
description: Florida Republicans are urging the Miami Herald to take action against metro columnist Fabiola Santiago, who tweeted on Sunday that Florida residents packing beaches “should work nicely to thin the ranks” of supporters of President Donald Trump and Gov. Ron D…
